article_title: Five Things Justice Scalia Said About Obamacare

article_metadata.description: The late Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia wasn’t a fan of the Affordable Care Act and opposed it when it came before the nation’s high court every time. Known for his blunt writings, here are some highlights from a dissenting opinion he wrote, published June 15, 2015, in what was the [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
